mapper.sql: create_time, create_user, id, business_type, org, work_name, work_souce, user_id, status
mapper.select: select from tb_work_info t1 left join (select business_type,proc_inst_id from tb_work_business_type_info WHERE business_type=1 group by proc_inst_id ,business_type) t2 on t1.proc_inst_id = t2.proc_inst_id left join tb_process_dept_rel t3 on t1.process_definition_id = t3.process_definition_id
mapper.sql: t1.id ,t1.business_type,t1.org_id as org,t1.work_name,t1.work_souce,t1.status,t1.create_time,t1.create_user,t1.proc_inst_id,t1.company_id,t1.org_ids as deptIds t1.property_id , t1.actual_user_id,t1.customer_id
mapper.select: select from tb_work_info t1 left join (select business_type,proc_inst_id from tb_work_business_type_info WHERE business_type=1 group by proc_inst_id ,business_type) t2 on t1.proc_inst_id = t2.proc_inst_id left join tb_process_dept_rel t3 on t1.process_definition_id = t3.process_definition_id
mapper.sql: t1.id ,t1.proc_inst_id,t1.business_type,t1.org_id,t1.work_name,t1.work_souce,t1.create_time,t1.create_user as userId,t1.company_id, t1.status as state, t1.org_ids, t2.ID_ as task_id ,t2.PROC_DEF_ID_ as procDefId ,t2.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefKey
mapper.select:
select
from tb_work_info t1 , act_ru_task t2 , tb_node_type t3 ,tb_process_dept_rel t4

select '待审批' as name ,count(*) as number from act_ru_task t1 , tb_node_type t2 where t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.proc_inst_id and t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ = t2.node_id and t2.node_type = 'APPROVAL' and t1.ASSIGNEE_ = #{query.assignee}
mapper.sql: t1.proc_inst_id, t1.id, t1.create_user as userId, t1.status, t1.work_souce, t1.work_name, t1.org_id, t1.business_type ,t1.status as state, t1.org_ids,t1.create_time ,t2.END_TIME_ as entTime
mapper.select:
select
from tb_work_info t1 , act_hi_taskinst t2 ,tb_node_type t3 , tb_process_dept_rel t4
mapper.sql: t1.id, t1.proc_inst_id,t1.business_type,t1.org_id,t1.work_name,t1.work_souce,t1.status,t1.create_time,t1.status as state, t1.org_ids,t1.create_user as userId
mapper.select:
select
from tb_work_info t1 left JOIN tb_flow_cc t2 on t1.proc_inst_id = t2.process_instance_id left join tb_process_dept_rel t3 on t1.process_definition_id = t3.process_definition_id

select
from tb_work_info t1 left join tb_process_dept_rel t2 on t1.process_definition_id = t2.process_definition_id

SELECT
FROM tb_work_info t1
select from tb_work_info t1 left join tb_process_dept_rel t2 on t1.process_definition_id = t2.process_definition_id

SELECT t2.process_node_type AS processNodeId ,count(*) AS number FROM act_ru_task t1, tb_node_type t2 WHERE t1.PROC_DEF_ID_ = t2.process_definition_id AND t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ = t2.node_id AND t1.ASSIGNEE_ = #{query.assignee} AND t2.node_type = 'APPROVAL' group by t2.process_node_type
select ID_ as taskId,ASSIGNEE_ as userId from act_ru_task where PROC_INST_ID_= #{query.processInstanceId}

select t2.process_node_type from act_hi_taskinst t1 ,tb_node_type t2 where t1.PROC_DEF_ID_ = t2.process_definition_id and t1.ASSIGNEE_= #{query.assignee} and t2.node_type ='TASK' GROUP BY t2.process_node_type

select from tb_work_info t1 left join act_hi_taskinst t2 on t1.proc_inst_id = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ left join tb_node_type t3 on t1.process_definition_id = t3.process_definition_id left join tb_process_dept_rel t4 on t1.process_definition_id=t4.process_definition_id

select
from tb_work_info t1 left join act_hi_taskinst t2 on t1.proc_inst_id = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ left join tb_node_type t3 on t1.process_definition_id = t3.process_definition_id left join tb_process_dept_rel t4 on t1.process_definition_id=t4.process_definition_id

select
from tb_work_info t1 left JOIN tb_flow_cc t2 on t1.proc_inst_id = t2.process_instance_id left join tb_process_dept_rel t3 on t1.process_definition_id = t3.process_definition_id
select from tb_work_info

select
from tb_work_info
select ID_ from act_hi_taskinst where TASK_DEF_KEY_ =#{taskDefinitionKey} and PROC_INST_ID_ =#{processInstanceId} and END_TIME_ is null

select count(*) as AgencyNumber from act_ru_task t1 left join tb_node_type t2 on t1.PROC_DEF_ID_ = t2.process_definition_id where t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ = t2.node_id and t2.node_type = #{query.nodeType} and t1.ASSIGNEE_= #{query.assignee}

select IF(count(*)>0,0,1) from act_ru_task t1 left join tb_node_type t2 on t1.PROC_DEF_ID_ = t2.process_definition_id where t1.ASSIGNEE_ = #{userId} and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{procInstId} and t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_=t2.node_id and t2.node_type=#{nodeType}
